snippet: To prevent shortages, Russia said it would wait several weeks to carry out the ban, which was a response to the shooting down of a Russian warplane.
abstract: Russia announces it will ban imports of fruits and vegetables from Turkey in response to downing of Russian warplane by Turkish military.
lead_paragraph: To prevent shortages, Russia said it would wait several weeks to carry out the ban, which was a response to the shooting down of a Russian warplane.

headline.main: Russia: Moscow Delays Enforcing Ban on Turkish Produce to Avoid Inflation
headline.print_headline: Europe; Russia: Moscow Delays Enforcing Ban on Turkish Produce to Avoid Inflation
